DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether turmeric is effective in improvement of diabetic nephropathy and in decrease in the amount of proteinuria and cytokine levels.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Turmeric on Diabetic Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetic nephropathy is leading cause of ESRF that many therapy recommended for it. In this study, we investigate effect of turmeric on diabetic nephropathy, thus we selected diabetic nephropathy patients and divided them into 2 groups. One group received turmeric + ACE inhibitor + Angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) and the second group received only ACE inhibitor + ARB.
DOC.criteria: diabetic nephropathy more than 300 mg proteinuria/day age more than 18 years old DM type 1
